name: Strategic Partnerships & M&A
description: Detect discussions about partnerships, acquisitions, and strategic business moves
positive_samples: Major acquisition announced: Company X acquires competitor for $500M
Strategic partnership formed to expand into Asian markets
Merger discussion: two leading players joining forces
Exclusive distribution agreement signed with major retailer
Investment round led by top-tier VC firm at $2B valuation
Joint venture announced to develop next-generation technology
Acquisition target identified with strong synergies
